column5: I just purchased 2 scotty manual downriggers off kijiji for a great price. I have never used downriggers before so had no idea what to do.  I decided to go on their website to see if I could find some installation instructions or general info and found all the info that I needed right away. Not too often does that happen.  So for now Scotty gets a big    and we will see how they work.  Dan
Talk to Percher for installation Dan.
Scotty makes a great downrigger Dan.Even the manual one with a ten pound ball is pretty easy coming up. Kerry
